channel.description: It's all spinning wheels & self-doubt until the first pot of coffee.

item.title: Freedom to Change Your Mind
item.description: <html><head></head><body>I posted a few days ago about freedom of and from choice, but I think thereâ€™s something orthogonal to that spectrum: The freedom to change your mind, both figuratively and literally.</body></html>
